abstract: Food writer Amanda Hesser called out a lot of her favorite cookbook authors--Heidi Swanson, Suzanne Goin, Patricia Wells, Julia Child, Mark Bittman, Marcella Hazan--in her piece for Sunday's Food & Drink issue answering the question "If You Could Have Only One Cookbook, What Should It Be?" There is one cookbook author she was too modest to include: herself.
